name: Dice&Dragons (David)
description:
A simple group RPG inspired by the ever-famous D&D, in which the characters must explore a dungeon and defeat the dragon.

Five minutes and you're ready to go! Just give the single-page instructions a read first.

This game provides the rules. You have toprovide the dice (d20, d12, d10, d8, d6 and d4 are all used). A simple grid is included in the ruleset.
